project.name: cp-elements
project.description: 'Codeprimate Elements' (a.k.a cp-elements) is a foundational Java Class Library and framework used to build software applications with the Java platform. Elements packages many robust APIs together in order to address various, distinct application concerns during development. Elememts is a highly efficient, simple, yet robust framework built on fundamental OO principles, best practices and design patterns to appropriately solve common and reoccuring problems in software development.
